title: Bloomberg Markets: Investors Turning From Earnings to News
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Investors Turning From Earnings to News
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Christopher J Cordaro Chief Executive Officer RegentAtlantic Capital Discussing as earnings season winds down, investors will start to focus on news out of Washington, North Korea, Russia, and the looming debt ceiling, all of which could lead to volatility in the markets.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
